snippet: Testimony and e-mails introduced as evidence in the corruption trial of a Yonkers councilwoman, Sandy Annabi, offer an unvarnished look at how Forest City Ratner carried out its lobbying effort.
abstract: Evidence presented in the corruption trial of former Yonkers City Council member Sandy Annabi offers an unvarnished look at how Forest City Ratner carried out its lobbying effort to get a proposed 81-acre luxury mall and housing complex project approved.
lead_paragraph: Testimony and e-mails introduced as evidence in the corruption trial of a Yonkers councilwoman, Sandy Annabi, offer an unvarnished look at how Forest City Ratner carried out its lobbying effort.

headline.seo: Window Into Forest Ratner’s Quest to Get Yonkers Project Approved
headline.main: Window Into Developer’s Relentless Quest to Get a Yonkers Project Approved
headline.print_headline: Window Into Developer’s Relentless Quest to Get a Yonkers Project Approved
